ing: 1/2 cup popcorn kernels, popped in an air popper
des: "A friend gave me a big bag of za'atar, and I started using it on popcorn. The combination with nutritional yeast and butter is pure yumminess."
ins: Put popped popcorn in a large bowl. Drizzle melted butter over the popcorn and mix. Sprinkle nutritional yeast and za'atar over the popcorn; mix.
